title: DETOX BALANCE - Liposlim 3in1
author: Name
cleaned_text: Description Nourishes, Detoxifies, Stimulates A detoxifying, skin-softening oil that combines the richness of lemon and with the power of the highest quality aromatherapy oils to leave skin feeling smooth and toned. This powerful synergy of Black pepper, Lemon, Sweet Almond oil and Jojoba oil is the perfect body detox. This lightweight body oil contains nourishing actives to help smooth and soften the skin while the uplifting fragrance of Lemon leaves the body and mind feeling refreshed. Ideal as part of an anti-cellulite or body cleansing program. BENEFITS Improves circulation. Reduce water retention. Detoxify Stimulates lymphatic system to eliminate toxins. Treats cellulite Has anti-inflammatory properties. Rejuvenate skin. Anti-aging Nourishes Skin best Vitamin E oil to promote scar healing. Contains VIT A, B Complex, E, Omega 3 fatty acids and Zinc.
